alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 12:42PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owyhee and east central Malheur Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1242 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jordan Valley, or 35 miles northeast of Rome, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Succor Creek Reservoir around 100 PM MDT. Sheaville, Malloy Ranch, Cow Lakes and Mahogany Mountain around 110 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
